Colossal 4–{4}{G}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this for its colossal cost to have it enter with four +1/+1 counters; or pay {4}{G}{G}{G} as a sorcery: Put four +1/+1 counters on it if it has none.)[/i]
Whenever a nontoken creature you control with a counter on it dies, create a 4/4 green Hydra creature token.
